title.en: A Short Prayer to Chöying Dorje

text.en: Single nirmāṇakāya embodiment of the activity of the three families,
text.en-trans: rik sum trinlé chikdü trulpé ku

text.en: Cared for and entrusted with a mandate by the Great Orgyen,
In future, the one hundred and thirty-seventh Buddha—
text.en-trans: ma ong sangye gya dang so dünpa

text.en: Chöying Dorje, at your feet I pray!
